description: Test cases extracted from shadow mode database for LLM extraction validation

test_cases.synthesized_question:
Hi all , I found out that all of my BSQ funds are missing from my Bisq app. I tried many times to synchronize the DAO, including from genesis block, but it is still stating 0 . All fields (except "Available non-BSQ balance (BTC)") are stating zero.
Additionally in the transaction list all the details state: "Not recognized" and amount in BSQ states: "N/A"

messages.content:

Additionally in the transaction list all the details state: "Not recognized" and amount in BSQ states: "N/A"
